author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: My first Christmas present of 2020
review:
Opening;

Bellatrix Lestrange is a recurring character in the Harry Potter franchise and this figure is in her prisoner outfit and is a very nice very complete figure .

The Minifigure-

The Minifigure has the very nice Bellatrix hair piece , her face has an evil smile and an angry looking face , her torso and legs are a continuous jumpsuit print and the back of the dress and arms have stripe printing . 

The accessories -

The accessories include some dark grey handcuffs and a printed 1×2 black tile and a black wand . The stand is the standard black CMF stand .

In conclusion -

this is a great figure and one of my favourites of the series she is just very complete with printing so I recommend it .
